events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of March 31st, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the initial report and damage description provided by the claimant.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case and communicate further steps.
Confirmation sent to the claimant acknowledging receipt of the claim and outlining the next stages in the process.
Request issued for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and the claimant’s driver's license to proceed with investigation.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report, pictures, and identification for claim validation.
Investigation team has begun assessing the vehicle damage and reviewing police report details to verify claim integrity.
Investigation concluded confirming the circumstances of the accident and approving the extent of damages claimed.
A settlement offer was prepared based on the investigation results and communicated to the claimant for review.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling of their case.
Formal approval of the claim was granted following acceptance of the settlement offer by the claimant.
Payment processed and issued to the claimant’s account to cover the approved vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and final correspondence with the claimant.
All documentation and case files related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
